description: Unique identifier for this purchase order attribute record (surrogate key).
Identifier of the attribute type applied to the purchase order (foreign key to attribute definition/lookup).
Stored value for the attribute, as text; may contain codes, free text, or numbers depending on the attribute’s data type.
Identifier of the purchase order this attribute belongs to (foreign key).
Timestamp when this attribute record was last updated by the system or a user.
Likely identifier of the user who last modified the record; sample appears to be a timestamp—confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user who created this attribute record.
Timestamp when the attribute record was created.
Identifier of the user who most recently modified this attribute record.
Timestamp of the most recent modification to this attribute record.
